minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I wanted to update you on how things are progressing with the company.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Take care of yourself first. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

minutes.speaker: Dr. Krishnan Vasanth
minutes.text: Banking was stable. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I'm trying to balance everything, but the investor meetings are crucial right now.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Have you eaten properly?. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The stress is temporary. Once we close this funding, things will stabilize.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

action_items.task: Set boundaries for work hours and family time
